data.name: ArcheAge: Fresh Adventurer Pack
data.detailed_description:
Just starting your journey in ArcheAge? This pack has everything you need to get you off on the right foot!

  • 10-Day Patron Access - Grants 20% more EXP, work 20% faster, own land, and more!
  • Expansion Scroll (x3) - Adds 10 slots to your Warehouse or Inventory
  • Bound Worker’s Compensation: 1000 (x3) - Grants 1000 labor
  • Bound Hereafter Stone (x100) - Creates a teleportation portal to locations you’ve visited
  • Bound Lucky Quicksilver Tonic (x10) - Increases loot drop rate
  • Bound Companion Growthstone (x10) - Grants XP to mounts/pets
  • Bound Adventurer’s XP Boost Potion (x10) - Increases XP gain and loot drop rate
  • Bound Cloudrun Glider - Enjoy a bird’s eye view of Erenor from this beautiful glider

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista SP1, Win7 SP1, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Must have at least 1024MB video memory
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: NTFS-formatted disk, Registered Trion Account, Glyph Client, and acceptance of License and Usage terms
